entry.title: E6000 Fray Lock 2 ounce 565200C, Case/6
entry.summary:
Vendor: Eclectic Products
Type: Amazing Goop
Price: 23.77

E6000 Fray Lock, 2 ounce    565200

Case of 6 tubes

Fray Lock permanently seals raw edges and locks knots - even on buttons. It's ideal for quilting, embroidery, sewing and cross-stitching.

  • Works great on thread knots and frayed fabric
  • Dries crystal clear
  • Acid-Free
  • Washable
  • Permanent
  • Soft and Flexible

entry.title: E6000 Fabri-Tack 4 ounce 565104C. Case of 6 tubes
entry.summary:
Vendor: Eclectic Products
Type: Amazing Goop
Price: 24.40

E6000 Extreme Tack, 4 ounce

Case of 6 tubes  #565104C

Extreme Tack is a unique adhesive that allows you to make your own glue dots! It dries tacky for repositioning - ideal for mounting paper and lightweight materials to scrapbooks, walls, home décor items and more.

  • Stays permanently tacky!
  • Excellent on all types of fabric and just about any substrate
  • Make adhesive dots or lines of any size
  • Use over and over!
  • Dries clear
  • Acid-Free
  • Washable

entry.title: E6000 Fabri-Fuse 2 ounce 565000. Case of 6 tubes
entry.summary:
Vendor: Eclectic Products
Type: Amazing Goop
Price: 19.78

E6000 Fabri-Fuse, 2 ounce.

Case of 6 tubes

Fabri-Fuse is an exceptional adhesive choice for all types of fabric and decorative items. Its extreme flexibility allows fabric to move and stretch - even after washing!

  • Great for projects using fabric, felt, metal, wood, glass, rubber and much more
  • Dries clear
  • Acid-Free
  • Washable
  • Low Odor

entry.title: Amazing Goop Automotive, 3.7 ounce Tube, #160011 (2 Tubes)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Eclectic Products
Type: Amazing Goop
Price: 7.96

Amazing AutomotiveGoop.   All Purpose  3.7 ounce Tube  #160011

Minimum 2 Tubes


One of the strongest, most flexible, all-purpose adhesives ever created.

Strongest single component adhesive.
Bonds to practically anything.
Fixes practically everything.
Seals with a flexible, waterproof hold.
Won't crack or break like superglue.
Withstands heat up to 150¬ F.

Mend vacuum cleaner attachments.
Seal worn or cracked water hoses.
Repair broken ceramic flowerpots.
Fix and tighten loose towel racks.
Adhere new handles onto garden tools.

FOR AIR SHIPMENTS, this product is classified as Hazardous.  Additional HazMat Fees Apply. See Terms and Conditions.

entry.title: Amazing Goop II Max 2 ounces 6 Per Case 142100C
entry.summary:
Vendor: Eclectic Products
Type: Amazing Goop
Price: 17.82

Amazing Goop II MAX

2oz. Tube

Case of 6 Tubes

AMAZING GOOP II MAX IS THE ULTIMATE REPAIR GLUE made for REAL WORLD APPLICATIONS.The UV inhibitors make it a perfect, permanent all-conditions adhesive with MAXimum impact flexibility. 

AMAZING GOOP II MAX is the ultimate repair glue that permanently holds its bond and remains flexible through all types of weather conditions, vibrations and uses.  Its formula contains UV inhibitors which allow it to withstand even the toughest of conditions outdoors.  The waterproof and paintable features help the product - and your repair - to remain perfect for REAL WORLD applications!  Great for sporting equipment and any other outdoor application you can think of!  Use on virtually any material indoors and out!

FOR AIR SHIPMENTS, this product is classified as Hazardous.  Additional HazMat Fees Apply. See Terms and Conditions.

Fees Apply. See Terms and Conditions.

Vendor: Eclectic Products

Plumbers Goop

3.7 Ounce Tube

Permanently seal your leaks.

Strongest single component adhesive.
Bonds to metal, tile, plastic, porcelain, rubber.
Seals with a flexible, waterproof hold.
Connects PVC, ABS, and copper pipes.

Uses:

Seal around metal sink traps.
Repair broken or leaking porcelain.

entry.title: Amazing Marine Goop, 3.7oz Tube 6/Case 170011C
entry.summary:
Vendor: Eclectic Products
Type: Amazing Goop
Price: 27.64

Marine Goop Adhesive

Amazing GOOP Marine has the same toughness, strength and versatility as our other GOOP products but is specially formulated to be UV resistant.  It's perfect for outdoor applications on items that will be exposed to sunlight, water or extreme temperatures.  Easily bonds to vinyl, rubber, glass, wood and more.

  • Strongest, most versatile adhesive available
  • UV resistant - resists yellowing and cracking
  • Paintable once cured
  • Use indoors or out
  • Temperature resistant - remains flexible, even in extreme temperatures
  • Dries Clear
  • Abrasion resistant - great for bonding items subject to vibration
  • Waterproof - bond remains secure even when exposed to water

 

ORM-D (Consumer Commodity) Product.  For Air Shipments this product is classified as Hazardous.  Additional HazMat Fees Apply. See Terms and Conditions.
